AZP_TOKEN: <acceptance test azp token using for auth token>
AZURE_ENTRA_CLIENT_ID: <azure entra client id for api management login>
AZURE_ENTRA_CLIENT_SECRET: <azure entra client secret for api management login>
EBIX_CERTIFICATE_PASSWORD: <certificate password for performing an ebix peek in api management>
AZURE_ENTRA_FRONTEND_APP_ID: <optional: frontend app id in b2c tenant>
AZURE_ENTRA_BACKEND_BFF_SCOPE: <optional: backend bff scope in b2c tenant>
mssql-data-url: <mssql server url, for use in sql connection string (Server=...)>
mssql-edi-database-name: <mssql database name, for use in sql connection string (Database=...)>
